cause.description:
I will be running the 26.2 mile Maui Marathon on September 16th, 2007 for the Arthritis Foundation as a member of the Joints in Motion training team. Prior to this marathon, I will raise $4000 in support of arthritis research and community-based education programs for the men, women and children affected by arthritis.
Please assist me in achieving my fundraising goal by making a donation to the Arthritis Foundation. Your generosity ensures that the Arthritis Foundation continues leading the way toward prevention, control and a cure of the number one cause of disability. You can make a donation using a credit card by visiting my webpage at
http://2007VJIM.kintera.org/maui/aab3e
Thank you very much for your support!
1. Arthritis is the leading cause of diability in the US and we need to work together toward prevention, control and a cure.
2. Arthritis affects one in three people, including men, women, teens and even children.
cause.mission: Raise money in support of arthritis research and community-based education programs for those affected by arthritis.
cause.name: Joints in Motion - Maui Marathon
